scripts.test:run: rm -rf allure-report test-results playwright-report allure-results && npx playwright test && allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean
scripts.test:run:chrome: rm -rf allure-report test-results playwright-report allure-results && npx playwright test  --project="Google Chrome" && allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean
